name: Tipping Point (itch) (geometerinc)
description:
There’s only one world.  The world you see is the same world everyone else sees.  And it’s dying.  Even if no one is playing, the world is out there endlessly dying and restarting unless enough people come together and play to tip the balance and bring the world to a self-sustaining level.  You can’t do it alone.  But you can be a part of the solution.

How to play

Your goal is to bring the world back to life by cooperating with others and interacting with the environment.

or arrow keys - move
short press  - interact
long press - destructive interaction
